name: Santa's Grotty Christmas
overview: Santa's had a bad year. Rudolph's nose has turned black, the goblins have turned cannibal and eaten the elves, and the fairies have all gone off to help the LGBTQ+ community blossom. Now Santa has to guide his ill-prepared sleigh over the rooftops of the world and he needs your help. Fight the evil powers of darkness and avoid all dangers and obstacles to deliver the gifts of Christmas before your supply of fairy dust runs out.
